data.title: Dolly Leonard Obituary
data.meta_description: Mrs. Dolly Marie Wagoner Leonard, age 66, of 1658 White Kennel Rd., passed away Monday October 9, 2006 at UNC Hospital in Chapel Hill. A native of Alamance County, she was wife...
data.text: Mrs. Dolly Marie Wagoner Leonard, age 66, of 1658 White Kennel Rd., passed away Monday October 9, 2006 at UNC Hospital in Chapel Hill. A native of Alamance County, she was wife of the late Robert R. Leonard and daughter of the late James D. and the late Elsie Mae Wells Wagoner. She was a short order cook at the Food Mart in Haw River Survivors include 2 sons, Stephen Wagoner and Tommy Leonard and wife Jeannie all of Burlington; daughters, Penny Turner of Snow Camp, Diane Johnston of Haw River, Cindy Moize and husband Tim of Gibsonville, Darlene Pittard of Elon and Tina Brantley and husband Jack of Graham; brother, Norman Wagoner and wife Velma of Burlington; sister, Frances Long of Burlington; grandchildren, Heather Leonard, McKenzie and Hunter Moize, Robin Wagoner, Christopher Johnston and wife Candy, Jennifer and Brandy Pittard, Peggy Burnette, J.W. Warren and Christy Leonard; 5 great grandchildren. She was preceded in death by her husband, parents, brothers, James Donald Wagoner and Robert Dee Wagoner and sister, Dorothy Wagoner. Funeral services will be held at 2:00 PM Thursday October 12, 2006 in the Lowe Funeral Home Chapel by Rev. D. L. Perry. Interment will follow in the Pine Hill Cemetery. Mrs. Leonard will remain at Lowe Funeral Home through the funeral service. The family will receive friends at Lowe Funeral Home and Crematory from 7-9 PM Wednesday. At other times the family will be at the home of Tina Brantley; 805 Buckner St., Graham, NC.
